data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Onboards new staff with corporate template". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.
